brains.title: How
brains.subtitle: Behind Brainy are five intelligences working together:

creator.title: CreatorBrainy™
creator.description: Creates content and versions automatically. Generates variants, optimizes copy, and adapts creatives to each platform without manual intervention.

calendar.title: CalendarBrainy™
calendar.description: Schedules, coordinates, and publishes without intervention. Selects the best times, distributes content strategically, and executes automatic publications.

ad.title: AdBrainy™
ad.description: Executes and optimizes your campaigns with precision. Adjusts bids in real-time, redistributes budgets, and maximizes ROAS automatically.

chat.title: ChatBrainy™
chat.description: Responds, converses, and converts leads in real-time. Automates responses, qualifies purchase intent, and captures opportunities instantly.

trend.title: TrendBrainy™
trend.description: Detects what's happening and proposes new ideas. Analyzes trends, monitors competition, and suggests relevant content automatically every week.

brains.footer: Everything happens smoothly, as if you had a complete team working non-stop.

conversations.footer: This is what it feels like to have a creative assistant working for you, all day long.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Transparent pricing that scales with your ad spend. Choose the right plan for your agency.
pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you invest. Our pricing model scales proportionally with your ad spend, no surprises.

howItWorks.title: How Does Pricing Work?

step1.title: Monthly Base Price
step1.description: Fixed monthly payment according to your chosen tier (Starter, Small Agencies, Scaled Agencies, Enterprise)

step2.title: Variable Media Percentage
step2.description: A percentage (10-20%) of your monthly ad spend is added depending on the tier

step3.title: Transparent Total
step3.description: No hidden costs. Clear billing with complete breakdown every month

howItWorks.example: Example: If you're on the Small Agencies tier ($1,250 USD/month) and invest $10,000 USD in ads, you'll pay: $1,250 USD + ($10,000 × 15%) =
howItWorks.integrationFee: Integration Cost: One-time payment of 50% of the monthly base price when activating each tier.
